summary:
Total Time: 25 minutes
Servings: 2
Ingredients:

250g cherries
100ml elderflower cordial
100g ricotta cheese
2 knobs preserved ginger
2 thick slices open-textured bread
2 heaped tbsp icing sugar

Cooking Directions:

Remove the stalks from 250g of ripe cherries, cut them in half and discard their stones. 
Pour 100ml of elderflower cordial into a mixing bowl with the cherries and leave them to marinate for a good hour in the fridge. 
Put 100g of ricotta cheese in a mixing bowl and stir in 2 heaped tbsp of icing sugar...
title: üçû Cherry, Ginger & Ricotta Toasts
